verses.text: Now \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* had \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, and joined \w affinity|strong="H2859"\w* with \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \add certain\add* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w killed|strong="H2076"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* for him in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, and for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add he had\add* with him, and \w persuaded|strong="H5496"\w* him to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \add with him\add* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*.\f + \fr 18.2 \ft after…: Heb. at the end of years\f*

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, Wilt thou \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with me to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, I \add am\add* as thou \add art\add*, and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and \add we will be\add* with thee in the \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

¶ And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Enquire|strong="H1875"\w*, I pray thee, at the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Therefore the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* of \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Shall we \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, or shall I \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*? And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

But \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is there\add* not here a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* besides, that we might \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of him?\f + \fr 18.6 \ft besides: Heb. yet, or, more\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \add There is\add* yet \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, by whom we may \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* him; for he never \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto me, but \w always|strong="H3117"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: the same \add is\add* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Imla|strong="H3229"\w*. And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let not the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* so.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add of his\add* \w officers|strong="H5631"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Fetch \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4319"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Imla|strong="H3229"\w*.\f + \fr 18.8 \ft officers: or, eunuchs\f*\f + \fr 18.8 \ft Fetch…: Heb. Hasten\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w either|strong="H0376"\w* of them on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* in \add their\add* \w robes|strong="H0899"\w*, and they \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in a void \w place|strong="H1637"\w* at the entering \w in|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*; and all the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.\f + \fr 18.9 \ft void…: or, floor\f*

And \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Chenaanah|strong="H3668"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, With these thou shalt \w push|strong="H5055"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* until they be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 18.10 \ft they…: Heb. thou consume them\f*

And all the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* so, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*, and \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And the \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \add declare\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w assent|strong="H6310"\w*; let thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* therefore, I pray thee, be like \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of theirs, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* thou \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 18.12 \ft with…: Heb. with one mouth\f*

And \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, even what my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, that will I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

And when he was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Micaiah|strong="H4318"\w*, shall we \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, or shall I \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go ye \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, and they shall be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, How many \w times|strong="H6471"\w* shall I \w adjure|strong="H7650"\w* thee that thou \w say|strong="H1696"\w* nothing but the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* to me in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I did \w see|strong="H7200"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, as \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* that have no \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, These have no \w master|strong="H0113"\w*; let them \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \add therefore\add* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, Did I not \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee \add that\add* he would not \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto me, but \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*?\f + \fr 18.17 \ft but evil: or, but for evil\f*

Again he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* upon his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* on his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* and \add on\add* his \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that he may go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* at \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*? And one \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* after this \w manner|strong="H3602"\w*, and another \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* after that \w manner|strong="H3602"\w*.

Then there came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* a \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* him. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Wherewith?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and be a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of all his \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*. And \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* \add him\add*, and thou shalt also \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*: go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add even\add* so.

Now therefore, behold, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of these thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against thee.

Then \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Chenaanah|strong="H3668"\w* came \w near|strong="H5066"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* upon the \w cheek|strong="H3895"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Which|strong="H0335"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* from me to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee?

And \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into an \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w* to \w hide|strong="H2244"\w* thyself.\f + \fr 18.24 \ft into…: or, from chamber to chamber: Heb. a chamber in a chamber\f*

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* ye \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w*, and carry him \w back|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* the \w governor|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and to \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Put|strong="H7760"\w* this \add fellow\add* in the \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* him with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H3906"\w* and with \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H3906"\w*, until I \w return|strong="H7725"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

And \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou \w certainly|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \add then\add* hath not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* by me. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, all ye \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, I will \w disguise|strong="H2664"\w* myself, and will \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*; but \w put|strong="H3847"\w* thou on thy \w robes|strong="H0899"\w*. So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w disguised|strong="H2664"\w* himself; and they \w went|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

Now the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* that \add were\add* with him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fight|strong="H3898"\w* ye not with \w small|strong="H6996"\w* or \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, save only with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, that they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. Therefore they compassed \w about|strong="H5437"\w* him to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*: but \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* cried \w out|strong="H2199"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* him; and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w moved|strong="H5496"\w* them \add to depart\add* from him.

For it came to pass, that, when the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w perceived|strong="H7200"\w* that it was not the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, they turned back \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from \w pursuing|strong="H0310"\w* him.\f + \fr 18.32 \ft from…: Heb. from after him\f*

And a \add certain\add* man \w drew|strong="H4900"\w* a \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* at a \w venture|strong="H8537"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* between the \w joints|strong="H1694"\w* of the \w harness|strong="H8302"\w*: therefore he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to his \w chariot|strong="H7395"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w Turn|strong="H2015"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that thou mayest carry me \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*; for I am \w wounded|strong="H2470"\w*.\f + \fr 18.33 \ft at a venture: Heb. in his simplicity\f*\f + \fr 18.33 \ft between…: Heb. between the joints and between the breastplate\f*\f + \fr 18.33 \ft wounded: Heb. made sick\f*

And the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w increased|strong="H5927"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: howbeit the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* stayed \add himself\add* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* in \add his\add* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w against|strong="H5227"\w* the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: and about the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* going \w down|strong="H0935"\w* he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.
